newsitem.title: USA: Fort Worth, Texas, $2.735 mln won by NationsBanc.
newsitem.headline: Fort Worth, Texas, $2.735 mln won by NationsBanc.

text.p: NationsBanc Capital Markets said it won $2.735 million of Fort Worth, Texas, combination tax and revenue certificates of obligation, Series 1996 B, with a true interest cost of 4.98 percent.
